alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oldham (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 6:14PM EDT until July 24 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clark County in south central Indiana... Oldham County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Jefferson County in central Kentucky... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 614 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Prospect, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lyndon, La Grange, Middletown, Douglass Hills, Prospect, Anchorage, Worthington Hills, Barbourmeade, Coldstream and Rolling Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
